TopicTitle: Astronaut complex: sort/search for crew member, jump to ship

Articles.Content:
In the Astronaut complex, it would be nice to be able to search for crew members (or even just sort by name). I was looking for Ronard, turns out he never existed since he was actually Rondard.

Once I've found the Kerbal I'm looking for, I should be able to click on him and go to the ship he's in.
